Retrieved 2012-12-5. ==Geography== ===Surrounding municipalities=== * Aomori Prefecture ** Fujisaki ** Goshogawara ** Hirakawa ** Hiranai ** Itayanagi ** Kuroishi ** Shichinohe ** Towada ** Yomogita ==Demography== According to Japanese census data,Aomori population statistics 1995 2000 2005 2010 2015 2020 314,917 318,732 311,386 299,520 287,648 275,340 ==Festivals== The Nebuta festival is one of the most famous festivals in Japan. It takes place at the beginning of August. More than 300,000 people come and see this festival every year. This festival is called both “Nebuta” and ”Neputa”. In Aomori city, they use the word “Nebuta”, and in Hirosaki city, they use the word “Neputa”. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in Aomori Prefecture
